Name.ElementValue: Developmental delay AND/OR other significant developmental or morphological phenotypes

SampleDescription.Description: Father is normal. Phenotype: growth delay, scoliosis, thoracic hemivertebrae and fused ribs, absent right kidney, normal left kidney, short stature, short webbed neck
Phenotype: developmental delay, speech delay, social awkwardness, PDD, overgrowth, macrocephaly, hypertelorism, small ears, high arched palate, maxillary hypoplasia, velopharyngeal sufficiency
